title: How to build an e-learning app - Quora

response.answer_text: When building an eLearning platform, it’s easy to get overpowered with all the information and features you could add to it. However, you need to ask yourself if those features and content will really help students and teachers reach their goals. There is no point in over-complicating your learning management platform if it’s not needed. So where should you exactly start? Firstly, It may take some time, it will cost you some serious money and effort. After all, you need a great team which comprises app developers, designers marketers and more. However, I will take you through the process step by step Market research Select the right authoring tool that fits your needsKnow your audience and subject matterSelect a proven existing E-learning template and add customizationSelect a cloud-based E-learning management system(LMS)for better flexibility.Personalized E-learning Solutions with a ready-made solution As I mentioned earlier, building a fully-customized E-learning solution can cost you a bit. But, the easiest way is always around, isn’t it? There are a lot of good opensource LMS available around the market which can be easily customized with an experienced team of developers. Adopt The Trends necessary for Developing an E-learning platform The impact of technology in almost every sector is remarkable, e-learning is not an exception as well. This makes online education more engaging and less complex. The more innovative technological aspects you integrate within your platform, the more it attracts the users. 1.Voice interfaces Learners can use voice commands to verbalize Google search with voice interfaces. In this way, they can easily access any information they need – for example, for word translations when keeping a focus on the main task. Teachers, on the other hand, can provide voice feedback to their learners. The effectiveness of such feedback is three times higher among learners compared to text feedback. 2.Learn Better with Videos Videos will be accounted for 80% of all internet traffic by 2021. Moreover, the impact of visual representation on e-learning is significant, it improves the knowledge retention among learners. Integrating videos as a learning approach is highly effective and admirable. 3.Cloud Storage for Efficient Learning It is better to integrate cloud storage to your app, it will help users to access, books, notes and communicate effectively with the mentors. 4.Augmented and Virtual Reality AR and VR are referred to as one of the best futuristic innovations of today. Several tech giants are investing massively in this technology. AR technology blurs the line between the real and virtual world, which helps users to grasp the highly sophisticated lessons more easily. Whilst AR induced e-learning apps have been launched already, the cost of implementing VR is still high and is not accessible to a wide range of audience. 5.Puzzles, Brain Games, and Memory Training Games Merging learning with fun is an effective way to improve the process. Offering your kids with brain games, memory training, and thought-provoking puzzles will help them balance learning and fun at the same hand. Besides, this enhances their ability to solve problems, think independently and many more. Hope this might help you.
